channel.title: Mining on CyberMiles News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in Mining on CyberMiles News and Articles

item.title: Ask CyberMiles Question 1: When will Mining be enabled on CMT Wallet?
item.description: Q: When will Mining be enabled on CMT Wallet? A: In a few weeks. Already top priority for engineers. We need to update the MainNet protocol first, and then release a new version of the CMT Wallet. We are extremely careful when it comes to asset safety. Be patient and stay tuned. Learn more at cybermiles.io.
